title: Understand
lyrics: Never thought that I'd find That the one in my life would be so near I got you , you got me When it's us , babe , you make me feel complete Ooh, ooh Maybe we can try it if you let me Take you by the hand    So I guess that it’s time I asked you to be mine for all my days I'll admit that I'm scared 'Cause I've never really cared as much as this Ooh, ooh Maybe we can try it if you let me Take you by the hand You’re the only one who understands   Ooh, ooh-ooh Ooh, ooh Maybe we can try it if you let me Take you by the hand You’re the only one who understands
